en_question:
Table 9-3 provides the construction schedule for a garage and its driveway. Table 9-3
Task IDTask DescriptionDuration (days)Predecessor Tasks
aSite clearing and preparation10--
bMaterial preparation8--
cGarage floor construction6a,b
dPrefabrication of walls and roof trusses16b
eCuring of concrete garage floor24c
fErecting wall frames4d,e
gErecting roof trusses4f
Continuation Table
Task IDTask DescriptionDuration (days)Predecessor Tasks
hInstalling windows and side walls10f
iInstalling doors4f
jInstalling ceiling12g
kPainting16h,i,j
LDriveway concrete construction8c
mCuring of driveway concrete24L
nSite cleanup and final inspection4k,m
Question: What is the shortest possible duration (in days) from the start to the full completion of this construction project?
